title: 10 of the toughest Print Group 1 Old Mills

posts.post_title: 10 of the toughest Print Group 1 Old Mills
posts.post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

Abbaticchio SGC 2 $425
Alperman SGC 3 $750
Bransfield PSA 1 $300
Davis SGC A $175
Hemphill PSA 1 $200
Jordan portrait PSA 1 $300
Niles PSA 2 $300
Stahl PSA 1mk $150
Sullivan SGC 3 $500
Wilhelm PSA 2 $425
